r.d: It takes an array of data as input and page it according to various parameters. It also builds links within a specified range, and allows complete customization of the output (it even works with mod_rewrite). Two operating modes available: "Jumping" and "Sliding" window style.
r.n: - allowed use of a javascript function in the fileName [bugs #2555 and #2754] - added Pager_Wrapper_DBDO() function in the /examples/Pager_Wrapper example (thanks to garak AT studenti DOT it) - replaced urlencode() with htmlentities() because it was too aggressive [bugs #2908, #3043 and #3212] - added 'currentPage' option (patch by Kendrick Vargas)
